Message: I want to train but I am tired, what should I do?
Don't give up! You've come so far already. Take a short break and then we can start again. How about 10-15 minutes?
Even if I am tired, tell me to train!
Alright! Let's get moving! Remember, every rep counts! Push yourself! You got this!
I am sweating buckets right here!
That's great! You're giving it your all! Keep going! You're almost there!
